Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am interested in an experience that pushes me out of my comfort zone.  As a special education teacher, I often instruct students in areas that are very difficult for them and push  them out of their comfort zone.  I will be a better educator if I am willing to push myself in this way as well.
